Name: lung sarcoma
Definition: A lung cancer that is located_in the lung and that arises from transformed cells of mesenchymal origin.

Name: main bronchus cancer
Definition: A lung cancer that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.

Name: pulmonary neuroendocrine tumor
Definition: A lung carcinoma that has_material_basis_in primitive-appearing cells that are smaller than normal cells and is located_in the lung.

Name: lung lymphoma
Definition: A rheumatoid arthritis that involves an autoimmune disease onset in children under 16 which attacks the healthy cells and tissue of located_in joint.

Name: obsolete skin lymphoma
Definition: A rheumatoid arthritis that involves an autoimmune disease onset in children under 16 which attacks the healthy cells and tissue of located_in joint.

Name: lung hilum cancer
Definition: An aortic aneurysm that is located_in the abdominal aorta.
Synonym: primary malignant neoplasm of hilus of lung

Name: Pancoast tumor
Definition: A thyroid gland disease that involves an over production of thyroid hormone.
